derivation: a primitive root; properly, to be enclosed (as if with fat); by implication (as denominative from H3824 (לֵבָב));  to unheart;  also as denominative from H3834 (לָבִיבָה) i.e.
outline:
1. to ravish, become intelligent, get a mind
    1. (Niphal) to take heart, become enheartened, become intelligent
    2. (Piel) to ravish the heart, encourage, make heart beat faster
  2. (Piel) to make cakes, bake cakes, cook bread
strongs_def: (in a good sense) transport (with love), or (in a bad sense) stultify; to make cakes
